item.title: Error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Loopget83 Loopget83
item.description:
@Loopget83 wrote:

client.java:13329: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Whats It Mean? I Cant Find Anything Wrong With It!
The Code===========

			[code]} 
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					} else {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
							bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					}[/code]

Read full topic
